Description: MCBRIDE MUSIC & PAWN 1981 KRAMER XL-5 ELECTRIC GUITAR Description: 1981 KRAMER XL-5, GOOD CONDITION. SEVERAL DINGS/SCRATCHES TO FINISH FROM REGULAR USE, ONE NOTABLE DING TO WOOD INSERT ON NECK, MISSING KNOBS, G STRING TUNING PEG SLIGHTLY BENT (WORKS NORMALLY). MODERATE FRET WEAR TO FRETS 1-6, BUT STILL PLAYS WELL, SOUNDS FANTASTIC. ONLY WEIGHS 9 LBS! A KILLER ALUMINUM NECK KRAMER, FEATURING SCHALLER HUMBUCKERS, ELABORATE SWITCHING OPTIONS (INCLUDING COIL TAP FOR THE BRIDGE HUMBUCKER AND A PHASE SWITCH), AND THAT ABSOLUTELY RADICAL BODY DESIGN PAIRED WITH THE EBONOL FINGERBOARD/ALUMINUM NECK. RESONATES LIKE A TRAIN TRACK, LOOKS SHARP AS A TACK. IIX/AIX Notes: McBride Music and Pawn is dedicated to giving great deals and providing excellent customer service.
